body_html:
These may have been deleted so save space. BUT, right now I don't think we need the separate gcc4.8 versions because protobuf is statically linked and leveldb is not included. Can you just try the normal non-gcc4.8 conda package and see if that works for you?

I will update the documentation to remove the reference to the gcc4.8 builds. If you encounter an issue with the non-gcc4.8 builds though, please open a different issue.

I will update the documentation to remove the reference to the gcc4.8 builds. If you encounter an issue with the non-gcc4.8 builds though, please open a different issue.
body:
These may have been deleted so save space. BUT, right now I don't think we need the separate gcc4.8 versions because protobuf is statically linked and leveldb is not included. Can you just try the normal non-gcc4.8 conda package and see if that works for you?

I will update the documentation to remove the reference to the gcc4.8 builds. If you encounter an issue with the non-gcc4.8 builds though, please open a different issue.
